LIST.PAGE.TITLE: Servicios
LIST.PAGE.SUBTITLE: Servicios de Asesoría Jurídica en México Distrito Federal y Estado de México
LIST.PAGE.DESCRIPTION: Nuestro equipo de abogados cuenta con conocimientos profundos en las distintas ramas del derecho, por lo que podemos brindarle a usted servicios legales de alta calidad, de forma oportuna, transparente y eficaz, para asuntos en materia familiar, civil, penal, laboral, mercantil, laboral, administrativa y juicios de amparo.

FAMILY.TITLE: Family Law Services
FAMILY.DESCRIPTION: The law includes certain rules and regulations that directly affect the formation, dissolution, and organization of the family unit. Our lawyers will use the current legal frameworks to help you resolve any legal conflict in family matters.

CIVIL.TITLE: Civil Law Services
CIVIL.DESCRIPTION: Relationships between individuals (whether voluntary or obligatory) generate interests that are governed by civil law. This specialized branch of our services is responsible for regulating and preserving the personal and property interests of individuals.

PENAL.TITLE: Criminal Law Services
PENAL.DESCRIPTION: This branch of our services is responsible for analyzing and utilizing the rules that regulate the determination of behaviors classified as crimes, as well as their investigation, prosecution, and penalties, to ensure the rights of victims and accused are respected.

LABOR.TITLE: Labor Law Services
LABOR.DESCRIPTION: This branch of our services is responsible for intervening and resolving all situations arising from labor relations, in accordance with the provisions of the Federal Labor Law or the Federal Law of Workers in the Service of the State, as the case may be.

COMMERCIAL.TITLE: Commercial Law Services
COMMERCIAL.DESCRIPTION: In this specialized branch of our services, a lawyer will be responsible for advising and resolving all legal aspects of your commercial activities (invoicing, collection, debts, commercial lawsuits), through the applicable legal provisions.

ADMINISTRATIVE.TITLE: Administrative Law Services
ADMINISTRATIVE.DESCRIPTION: A specialist will help you ensure that your activities (construction, modifications, opening businesses and establishments, etc.) comply with the requirements established by administrative laws.

AMPARO.TITLE: Amparo Trial
AMPARO.DESCRIPTION: Our lawyers will file amparo lawsuits to exercise your constitutional rights and protect you against possible abuses or damages caused by regulations, sanctions, laws, acts, or omissions by public authorities.
